title: Philaster, or, Love lies a bleeding a tragi-comedy, as it is now acted at His Majesty's Theatre Royal ...
author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
An alteration of Beaumont and Fletcher's play, by Elkanah Settle. cf. F.C. Brown, Elkanah Settle, p. 99.
